resources.string:
Hi, my name is John Paul 

I love Jollof Rice 

The kind that is prepared in big party pot with the burnt flavour haha 
Fun fact is that I love Tom Clancy novels especially the Sum of all fears... wonderful thriller 

I like Suits; Harvey Specter, Mike Ross, Jessica Pearson, Donna Paulsen and Rachel Zane are my favs 
And sometimes I even watch Silicon Valley 
And even less sometimes I make plans 

Once upon a time, I was browsing through twitter, I searched for a man and I sent him because I found his work on medical imaging interesting 

I'll happy to show you around Ibadan if you come visiting. 
You should watch Suits, it's a good show.
